title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a goat for a married man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a goat for a married man: The birth of a small goat is a harbinger of abundant livelihood and obtaining a lot of money and many good things in the coming days. Or the birth of a goat in the dream of a man who hopes that his wife will give birth may be a sign that his wife is approaching pregnancy. If this person About to get a new job, the birth of a goat portends him great profits or many achievements in this business. If you see a goat giving birth to more than one goat, it may be a harbinger of multiple offspring that the dreamer will have. If the dreamer is suffering from extreme anguish and sadness, The birth of a goat in a dream expresses relief after distress and the approaching comfort after distress. Also, seeing a goat giving birth in a dream indicates multiple means of lawful livelihood that will appear before this person in the near future. It is said that the interpretation of a dream about a goat giving birth to a married man is a sign of Many happy occasions are approaching in the coming period. If the dreamer is sick, the birth of a small goat is good news of his recovery, by God’s will. And do not forget to read our article about: Interpretation of a dream about a small black goat. A dream about seeing a goat in a dream. The appearance of a small goat in a dream for a man who has a pregnant wife indicates However, his wife is pregnant with a male child, God willing. A small goat appearing in a dream expresses the unexpected arrival of many good things for the dreamer. If the dreamer is facing many marital problems and disputes, the appearance of a small goat in his dream portends the end of these problems and their imminent resolution. Perhaps the small goat dreaming of a man looking for a good job is one of the signs of finding a good job opportunity. Or the small goat could be the sign of the appearance of a good opportunity to travel abroad through which she can fulfill her dreams. Interpretation of seeing a dead goat in a dream: If the goat that appeared dies In a man’s dream, this man may suffer from many worries and sorrows in the coming days. Or the dead goat may be the result of his poor marital condition with his wife and the many marital disputes between them. Perhaps the death of a goat in a dream is a sign of this man’s separation from his wife in the coming days. Or it may The death of a goat is a sign that this person will face a health problem in the coming days. A dead goat also indicates this person’s feeling of failure, despair, and disappointment at this time in his life. Or the death of a goat could be a sign of the approaching death of someone close to the dreamer. No Feel free to visit our article about: Interpretation of a dream about a goat in the house for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a goat in a dream for a married man. The appearance of a goat in a man’s dream indicates that this person’s situation will change for the better in the coming days. If the goat chases the dreamer, he will obtain endless blessings in the coming days. Also, seeing a goat in a man’s dream means that this man will obtain an important position in his current job. The appearance of a goat in a man’s dream can be a sign of many successive achievements and successes in the workplace. You can also learn about: Interpretation of a dream about sheep for a single woman and a woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bee and a wasp in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Bees are beneficial insects that produce honey for us, while wasps are deformed insects that, if they sting a person, cause severe pain. According to their appearance from one person to another, and this we will explain to you in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a window in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bee and a wasp in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a wasp appears in a dream, this indicates a catastrophe and disaster coming on the path of the dreamer in the near future. As for bees They are insects that indicate abundant livelihood for the dreamer. The presence of a wasp in a woman’s dream in her home indicates many disputes and problems that will arise between her and her husband. As for bees in the home of a sick married woman, they are signs of her approaching recovery. If a wasp appears in a pregnant woman’s dream, This may indicate that she is facing problems during childbirth, while the appearance of bees in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of good health for her and the fetus. Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream for a married woman and a pregnant woman. The meaning and importance of seeing bees in a dream. Dream interpreters say that the appearance of bees in a dream is A sign that the dreamer has gotten rid of the worries and sorrows that dominate him at this time in his life. Seeing bees stinging an unmarried girl is a sign that this girl is approaching the girl’s club and that she is about to marry the person she desires. Seeing the queen bee in a man’s dream is a sign This man will advance in his current job and obtain a new presidential position. Seeing a beehive in a dream is one of the signs of multiple lawful livelihoods that will appear to the dreamer in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about ants in a dream for a single woman and a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a wasp in a dream and its meaning. Many claim Dream interpreters say that if a wasp appears in a man’s dream, this may indicate that this man will suffer many successive financial losses in the coming period. The appearance of wasps in a man’s dream in general can symbolize the presence of a disreputable woman in his life in the coming period. A sting A wasp in a dream for both men and women is a warning that the dreamer will face a difficult problem in the coming days, and it may be difficult for him to get out of it. A wasp in a dream can also indicate the presence of an enemy who is trying to harm the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a dream about a tumor and swelling In a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bee and a wasp in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing more than one wasp in a dream is one of the signs of the presence of a group of bad companions in the dreamer’s life, and he should beware of them. As for the bee, it is one of the indications that the dreamer is organizing his life in general, and it is Which always brings him positive results in his life. Imam Al-Sadiq considers seeing bees in a dream to be a sign of the dreamer’s multiple offspring, male or female. As for seeing a queen, it is a sign that the dreamer will acquire great wealth or an unexpected inheritance in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about roses In a dream. Clarifying the interpretation of seeing a bee and a wasp in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about rubies in a dream. Ibn Shaheen confirms that a bee sting is one of the signs that the one who made the solution

title: Learn about the interpretation of a carpet in a dream from Ibn Sirin, washing the carpet in a dream, and the interpretation of a dream about a gift of a carpet

preview.html: Carpet in a dream Does seeing a carpet symbolize good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of carpets in a dream? And what does a dream about a torn carpet mean? Read this article and learn about the interpretation of seeing a carpet for singles, married people, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin and scholars of interpretation. Carpet in a dream Seeing a carpet indicates happiness, cover, good health, and material prosperity. If the patient sees a new carpet in his home, the dream indicates that he will be free from diseases and ailments, and the carpet for the seeker of knowledge is a sign of success and excellence in study, but scholars interpreted the rolled carpet as a sign that he will soon go through some difficult circumstances. The rolled carpet also indicates that the dreamer bears a great responsibility beyond his capacity at this time, and as for the merchant, it means that he will go through a long period of material discomfort, and if the dreamer sees an old but beautiful carpet in his dream, this indicates that he feels sad because of some unfortunate events that he went through in the previous period. Scholars interpreted the vision of the new carpet as a symbol of a new experience that the dreamer will soon experience and gain many benefits, and the thin carpet is a sign that the dreamer feels weak and helpless and does not have the ability to continue striving to achieve his goals. The dreamer's head The carpet in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of the carpet as evidence of the ease of difficult matters for the visionary and the fulfillment of all his desires in the near future. He was about to fall into a major crisis, but Almighty God wrote to him to survive it. If the dreamer buys a carpet in his dream, this symbolizes buying a new house or car soon, moving to a new job, or practicing a sport or different hobbies that he has not practiced before. Which he deserves. The online dream interpretation site is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type the online dream interpretation site Search in Google and get the correct interpretations. Carpet in a dream for a single woman Scholars interpreted the carpet in the dream of an unmarried woman as an indication that she will soon find a wonderful job that matches her skills and talents, and if the dreamer sees a strange carpet in her house, this symbolizes that she suffers from loneliness and emotionality. Emptiness and her need for marriage and stability, and soon she will receive a valuable gift. Buying a carpet indicates her imminent marriage contract with a righteous man whom she falls in love with at first sight, and if the dreamer sees a red carpet in her dream, this indicates that she will hear some good news. If the owner of the dream is washing the carpet, this indicates that he is currently suffering from some problems, but he is a strong and courageous person who does not allow problems to disturb his life. The carpet in a dream for a married woman It is said that the carpet in a dream for a married woman is a sign of abundant kindness and obtaining lawful money from work. Scholars interpret the vision of a green carpet for a married woman as evidence that she will soon hear some good news about her family, and the dream of a woman who is currently suffering from a certain disaster is a sign of

title: Interpretation of seeing a needle in the hand and a cannon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a needle in the hand and a cannon in a dream. In fact, the needle and cannon are considered medical tools used in treating patients. Which is used in the muscle treatment of the patient. On the other hand, the interpretation of seeing a needle in the hand carries with it a group of interpretations that people search for through Ibn Sirin’s interpretations. The interpretation of seeing a needle in the hand and a cannon in a dream is not worth anything, and some people are afraid of the needle, so let them hear the name of the needle, and a great obsession with it. Fear and dread. On the other hand, the interpretation of seeing a needle in the hand has many interpretations, which are as follows: On the other hand, seeing a needle in a dream indicates health problems suffered by the dreamer. Also, seeing a person holding a needle in his hand, or placing a cannula needle in his hand, is a sign of... Healing from diseases and illnesses. Also, if a married woman sees a needle inserted into her arm, this is a sign of a problem in her life and it will disappear, God willing. Therefore, removing a needle in a dream indicates overcoming difficulties and problems in life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna or henna In a dream, one of the most famous interpreters is the interpretation of seeing a cannula in a dream. In reality, the cannula is one of the intravenous needles where the patient is given intravenous treatment, and therefore it is one of the procedures that the patient needs in order to obtain treatment quickly. On the other hand, people are looking for an interpretation of seeing a cannula needle in the arm and through pajamas: It should be noted that installing a cannula in a dream indicates Healing from illnesses and illnesses, but seeing a needle inserted in a dream indicates rejection of the marital problems that the wife is suffering from. On the other hand, seeing a needle removed from the hand is a sign of refraining from making wrong decisions and returning to the right path. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing rotten eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Dreaming of a needle in a vein. In reality, the interpretation of seeing a needle in a vein is a dream that haunts people and which they believe may cause illness or anything else. But interpretation scholars came, such as Ibn Sirino, to interpret seeing a needle in a vein, which has the following meanings: Also, seeing a needle in a dream indicates exposure to problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. If you see a needle in the hand of a divorced woman, this is evidence of the sadness she is experiencing because of the problems she was exposed to before the divorce. Also, seeing a needle in a dream means being exposed to insulting words, in addition to the possibility of canceling an engagement with an unmarried girl. See also: Interpretation of a dream about entering a stranger’s house In a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about removing the base from the hand. The hand is swollen with saline solution intravenously (fourth). In addition to that, the fear that controls people and when they are asked to receive treatment intravenously and through the cannula is a needle puncture and therefore they have many dreams and those related to needles to search for an interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream. In addition to Removing the cannula from the arm, which is as follows: Therefore, seeing a needle inserted in a dream indicates exposure to problems and psychological pressures, but if it sees...

title: Interpretation of a dream about divorce

preview.html: Divorce is actually one of the worst things that a man and a woman can go through. As we know, it is one of the most hated permissible matters to God, but what if we see that divorce takes place in a dream, and in this case the dream is disturbing, especially for women, but the interpretation does not always mean divorce. In more cases, you may be interested in knowing about drinking alcohol in a dream. The interpretation of divorce in a dream indicates a change in lifestyle or estrangement and separation from a family member, and we will learn more about these interpretations below. Divorce in a dream indicates changing the dreamer’s job to find a better job. Requesting a divorce In a dream, it indicates a lot of good that the dreamer will receive in the future. Seeing a divorce paper in a dream indicates strong problems and disagreements that occur in the dreamer’s life and losing a sense of stability and security. The interpretation of divorce in a dream indicates a change in lifestyle. As we mentioned previously, the dream of divorce between spouses It does not mean their separation, but it basically means the big change that will occur in the fortuneteller’s life. Also, the vision of divorce that a single young man may see symbolizes the approaching of his marriage. But if a married man sees himself divorcing his wife in court and feels sad and hateful when he wakes up, it will happen. It is He saw that he divorced his wife and married another beautiful woman, so this is good news that symbolizes money and wealth in general. Whoever dreams of divorcing his wife three times, this indicates that he will commit sin again. The interpretation of this vision depends on the dreamer’s feeling after waking up from sleep. If he is happy with this divorce, then it is good, and if he is sad, then it symbolizes evil, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream indicates a change in the married woman’s lifestyle. What a woman fears most in her life is divorce and the loss of stability for her and her family. If she sees this dream even once, she will feel With fear. But this dream shows her goodness and blessing. For example, if she saw her husband divorcing her three times, this means three discoveries or three means of livelihood that she will obtain with health, money, and love. It is also possible that what worries the wife is a family dispute between her and her husband, so she will have dreams. It also indicates that the woman is pregnant unless she has given birth to him yet. It also announces her husband’s love for her and his great attachment to her. But this dream is mostly a good omen for a married woman. The interpretation of divorce indicates a change in the lifestyle of an unmarried girl. If an unmarried girl sees that she is separating from Someone she does not know and then felt happy, this indicates that she will get married soon. And if she saw that she was hurt by this separation, this indicates her separation from her best friend. It showed that there were problems between her and a member of her family. Or problems appeared in her professional life. This vision indicates She will not complete her education if she has not graduated yet. It also indicates the goodness that comes to her from her father. Interpretation of divorce in a dream for a pregnant woman. This vision for a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth easily, God willing. It also indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. It also symbolizes happiness and nourishment in Her lifeCher E

title: Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I called my mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the great commentators.

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I called my mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The science of dream interpretation is one of the sciences based on a set of rules derived from the verses of the Holy Qur’an and the books of the Prophet’s biography, or in other words, the science of dream interpretation is one of the established Islamic sciences. Science and not a kind of imagination. Science and its advantage, from here in this article we move on to talk in detail about the interpretation of a dream I dreamed of having sex with my mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Therefore, the interpretation of the dream in which I dreamed of communicating with my mother in a dream is as follows: This vision in general suggests that the dreamer faces many problems and difficulties with all family members, which negatively affects their lives. In addition to seeing the fortune teller that he is having sex with his mother and his mother is angry and crying, this dream was a sign and evidence of many problems and disputes between the fortune teller and his mother in reality, and it may reach a rift between them. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is having sex with his mother and then semen comes out, this means that he is a bad person and disobeys his mother in real life. And whoever sees in a dream that he is having sex with his dead mother, this indicates that he misses her very much. title: Learn about the interpretation of the guest symbol in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Symbol of a dream visitor: A visitor in a dream symbolizes many different connotations, due to the difference in the gender of the visitor, is he female or male? In addition to the person who had the vision and his social status, he is a married or divorced woman, so we find hundreds of different interpretations by major jurists and interpreters. If you are interested in searching for the symbol of the visitor in a dream, you can watch this article. The symbol of the guest in a dream When interpreting the symbol of the visitor in a dream, scholars have given interpretations Different, such as: Al-Nabulsi says that the symbol of the visitor is different in the dream. If the visitor is a boss or an important official, this is a sign of the dreamer’s dominance and authority, but if he is a famous person, this indicates the dreamer’s reputation in his professional life. Seeing a dead guest in a dream can symbolize loss if he ate in the dreamer’s house. Whoever was sick and saw A dead guest visits him and goes with him, this is a sign of his death. If the dreamer sees a guest crying in his house, this may indicate a disaster. Symbol of a visitor in a dream by Ibn Sirin In his interpretation of the symbol of a visitor in a dream, Ibn Sirin mentioned different connotations that could be praiseworthy or unwelcome For example: Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees guests in his house is good news of a happy occasion. If the fortuneteller sees guests in his house and does not accommodate them and sees a shortage of food and drink, then he regrets his action. The symbol of a visitor in a dream indicates the return of a traveler. Guests in a person’s dream are a sign On close commitment, if the appearance is good. The symbol of a guest in a dream for singlesIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream a guest who looks handsome and smells nice, it means that good news is coming, such as an engagement. While seeing a strange guest in a girl’s dream with a bad smell can warn her of her involvement In a big problem. Seeing close relatives eating in the dreamer’s dream is a symbol of her success in studying. The symbol of the guest in a married woman’s dream. Al-Nabulsi reported that seeing the unknown visitor in a married woman’s dream indicates the arrival of kindness, abundant livelihood, and the possibility of an imminent pregnancy. Whoever sees in her dream that she is honoring a guest in She is a good woman and loved by others. If the dreamer sees in her dream that her husband is embarrassing her in front of a guest, she may go through a financial crisis that will put him in a difficult position. Watching the fortuneteller preparing a feast and receiving guests in her house is good news about the success of one of her children or his marriage if he At the appropriate age. The symbol of the visitor in a pregnant woman’s dream. Al-Nabulsi says that the visitor in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the birth of a male child. To dream of a pregnant woman sitting with guests and laughing is a sign of easy birth and offering blessings and congratulations on the arrival of the new baby. The symbol of the visitor in a divorced woman’s dream if she sees A divorced woman sees guests from her ex-husband’s family in a dream, as this is a sign of efforts to reconcile and return to him again. While seeing a strange guest in a divorced woman’s dream may indicate a second marriage. Jurists also referred to a prostitute who saw a guest she knows, who is a disreputable person, As an indication of her desire for this from others and that person’s attempt to attract her. T. explains

title: Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream, the meaning of prayer in a dream, dream interpretation of the dawn prayer, interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream, interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream through the interpretation books of scholars Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, through our article today on our website, the vision.interpretation Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream indicates the dreamer’s religious commitment and closeness to God Almighty. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream indicates good news and a positive change in the dreamer’s life. Seeing the dreamer performing the dawn prayer in a dream indicates intense interest from the viewer. With issues of the Sunnah. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream indicates relief after hardship, hardship after poverty, and recovery after illness. Seeing the dawn prayer in the opposite direction to the Qiblah indicates major sins committed by the dreamer. Seeing you listening to the dawn prayer without dreaming indicates the instability of the dreamer’s life and his exposure to many problems. Interpretation Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream announces the imminence of her marriage to someone who suits her and desires that. Seeing me hearing the dawn in a dream indicates success, excellence, and achieving goals. Seeing an unmarried woman praying dawn in a dream indicates that her prayer will be answered after intense insistence. Seeing prayer outside the qiblah for a single woman indicates On many sins and actions committed by unmarried women. Seeing an unmarried woman praying the dawn prayer after sunrise indicates guidance, repentance, and drawing closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer for a married woman in a dream. Seeing the dawn prayer and greetings in a dream for a married woman indicates the end of her troubles and the disappearance of her worries and sorrows. Seeing a married woman praying the dawn prayer in white clothes in a dream indicates that he will perform the Hajj or Umrah, whichever comes first. Seeing the dawn prayer at home for a married woman announces the blessing and goodness that will come to her. Seeing a married woman abandoning the dawn prayer in a dream indicates her shortcomings in her religion. The wife considers her husband an imam. In the dawn prayer, he declares his kindness and love for his wife. Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman. Mention the date of birth, ease and comfort. Seeing hearing the dawn prayer in a dream announces that she will give birth to a girl if the sight is in the first months. Seeing the dawn prayer in the mosque says that she has a good and righteous friend Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer for a man. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream for a man in a group showed that he reaches for his mercy and does righteous deeds. Seeing the dawn prayer with the dead person in a dream for a man showed the kindness of his actions and asked God for forgiveness for him. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream of a man in the bathroom indicates the sins that the dreamer has committed in his life. And he must repent for it quickly. Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in dirty places. Seeing praying in the bathroom indicates the sins and sins committed by the monarch or ruler. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream in a place full of dirt announces the followers of heresies and temptations. Seeing the prayer facing the Qiblah announces a great sin. Seeing the prayer from the east side states On the one who sees it

title: Interpretation of a dream about planting a dead plant in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of farming for the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin, as seeing farming in general is one of the visions that indicate good and abundant livelihood for the dreamer in the coming days of his life, but if he is seen in contact with the dead, it is considered one of the puzzling visions that arouses the curiosity of many people to know whether Is it a good vision or is it considered a bad vision? During this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about planting. The dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about planting a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Because many dream interpretation scholars, including the scholar Ibn Sirin, who tried to clarify these interpretations that they contain may contain messages of warning and notification to the seer of the dead, and in this paragraph we explain to you the interpretation of a dream about planting a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Cerinho also: If a person sees green plants in a dream. This dream is evidence of a blessing in the diet and longevity of the pioneer. While if one sees in a dream that he plants dead or withered, this is evidence of imminent death or it indicates a serious illness. Also seeing the plant Green in front of the house. It indicates the disappearance of all problems and worries. Rather, it indicates good news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing plants inside the house is considered a sign of the fulfillment of desires. Also, seeing green crops is a sign of good gains, as well as lawful money. Seeing a plant A dead person in a dream is a sign of material losses. In addition, seeing green plants in a patient’s dream is evidence of his recovery from the disease, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: A detailed explanation by Ibn Sirin about seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead father planting crops in a dream, especially since Such visions arouse curiosity in knowing their interpretations. Perhaps they are good news for the fortuneteller or they contain messages that the dead want to convey to the living. In this context, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a dead father farming in a dream is also: seeing a dead father in a dream and that he is working in agriculture. This dream It is a sign that the dreamer will have a child in the near future. Planting means birth, and new planting means new birth. Therefore, it is a sign of the newborn entering this life, and God Almighty knows best. If a person sees in a dream that his father gives him a gift or gives him a plant such as a rose or a plant. It is evidence that the father wishes the pioneer to complete his position on the path and to do good in life, to complete his father’s journey in life, and God Almighty knows best. Accordingly, planting in a dream by a dead father is only a sign of the dreamer’s kindness, and God Almighty, And the Great, the Great, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Seeing a dead mother farming in a dream. Seeing a deceased mother engaged in farming is considered one of the visions that includes many different interpretations that can be considered good interpretations and connotations, and in this The context: We will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a dead mother planting in a dream. It is also: If one sees in a dream that the dead mother is planting it. It is evidence of many...

title: Interpretation of dreams about an injured chest

preview.html: It is found especially for women, whether married or pregnant, but when interpreting these dreams, each one has a different interpretation that suits their situation. Dream interpreters have provided different interpretations related to this topic and we will present them in this article through the article website mqaall.com. Interpretation of dreams For an injured breast. Some interpreters say that the interpretation of a dream about an injured breast is a dream that has many interpretations, depending on the dreamer’s person, where the interpretation is as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing breasts in a dream shows the mother’s feelings hidden inside any mother. As for an unmarried girl, she It indicates marriage. It can also indicate the emotional feelings that a woman needs. Seeing a wound or wound in the chest, this indicates the presence of annoying words to which a woman with sight is exposed. She also sees the wounded unmarried woman’s chest lacking many feelings, so she needs To love, tenderness and tenderness. The appearance of an injured breast in a dream may indicate that this person will enter into a new relationship, but it may end in failure. This dream also shows a married woman that she is suffering from cruelty towards her husband. See also: Interpretation of seeing enlarged breasts in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation A single woman’s dream of an injured breast: If an unmarried girl sees her breast injured in her dream, this is an interpretation according to dream interpreters, which is as follows: Dreaming of a girl’s wounded breast, which was exposed, can grant her marriage as soon as possible. If the breast is exposed in front of a relative or stranger, this It indicates marriage in the near future. If an unmarried woman dreams of a breast from which milk comes out, this indicates that God Almighty will provide her with a good husband with good morals. But if blood or something unsuitable comes out of her breast, this indicates that she will marry someone who does not suit her. For her. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream her clothes, including the bra, and her cover is visible to the people around her, this indicates a scandal or forbidden behavior, and God knows best. If a girl sees that her breasts are small, this indicates the purity and chastity that characterizes this girl. If she sees that her breasts are large, this may indicate that she will marry a prominent or noble man. Interpretation of a dream about a breast injury in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman can see many dreams in one dream, but if a wound appears in her chest in a dream, this shows her The following: Seeing her bare breasts in a dream for a pregnant woman means that God will give birth to her easily, and that she will breastfeed her child naturally by God’s command. But if she sees that she took it out and breastfed a child, this indicates that she will give birth to her, like the one who nursed him according to the vision. If the child is a male, God will grant him a male, but if it is a female, then he will be blessed with a female, and God knows best. Seeing the breast coming out of milk, this indicates that she will give birth to a child, and that will be the reason for her happiness and his father’s happiness, and it will be a source of goodness. But if she sees that she has removed her breast and something comes out Unpleasant or bleeding, this indicates that the child will tire her parents until she recovers. If she dreams of
